phrs.translation: 十分之一奉献和其他的奉献

sentences.sentence: That means that Levi himself is giving tithes to Melchizedek.
sentences.translation: 这就意味着利未自己也给麦基洗德献了十分之一的物品。

sentences.sentence: And as I may so say, Levi also, who received tithes, payed tithes in Abraham.
sentences.translation: 其实可以说，藉著亚伯拉罕，就是收取了十分之一的利未也纳了十分之一呢！

sentences.sentence: And if a man will at all redeem ought of his tithes, he shall add thereto the fifth part thereof.
sentences.translation: 人若要赎这十分之一的什么物，就要加上五分之一。
